sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { IProduct } from '../../../models/product.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.scss'], }) export class ProductsComponent { products: IProduct[] = [ { id: '1', name: 'Laptop', image: 'https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0101/2522/products/LD0005959734_d11abfc9-3919-4245-a1dc-cc283615c6d3_1600x.jpg?v=1657154270', price: 100, }, { id: '2', name: 'Iphone', image: 'https://www.apple.com/newsroom/images/product/iphone/geo/Apple-iPhone-14-iPhone-14-Plus-hero-220907-geo_Full-Bleed-Image.jpg.large.jpg', price: 100, }, { id: '3', name: 'Phone', image: 'https://www.max.com.gt/media/catalog/product/cache/40cff66e483d5074b1ae49efef994171/m/o/motog22b.png', price: 100, }, { id: '4', name: 'Mouse', image: 'https://www.officedepot.com.gt/medias/35045.jpg-1200ftw?context=bWFzdGVyfHJvb3R8MTgyOTM3fGltYWdlL2pwZWd8aDlhL2hkNi85OTEwOTY2MTkwMTEwLmpwZ3w0YzQzOTdkY2U4Zjc1ZDI0NzkwZjU3ZTM1YjdlOGU3Mjk1YTI1YWU2MjA1OWNlODdiZmM5N2E1ZDkwYTMyZjNl', price: 100, }, ]; }
